The current server path is confluencemigratorpro.batches.create.confirmButton=Confirm
## Batch section confluencepro.howToMigrate.batch.title=Create or copy batches to import multiple Confluence exports confluencemigratorpro.baches.section.hint=Alternatively, select from below a batch to copy and start from it. All its migrations will be copied and you will be able to review and tweak them, and then run the batch.
## Batch sheet confluencemigratorpro.batches.batch.refreshLivedata.hint=The status of the job in the above table is not refreshed automatically, and you have to trigger it manually confluencemigratorpro.batches.batch.refreshLivedata.button=Refresh confluencemigratorpro.batches.batchSheet.stats=Stats confluencemigratorpro.batches.batchSheet.fixReferences=Fix references confluencemigratorpro.batches.batchSheet.copyBatch=Copy batch confluencemigratorpro.batches.batchSheet.runBatch=Run batch confluencemigratorpro.batches.batchSheet.resumeBatch=Resume batch
